scripts.pr:ge: cd packages/shared && npx prisma generate && cd ../.. && pnpm interfaces  && pnpm dtos
scripts.pr:pu: cd packages/shared && npx prisma db push && cd ../..
scripts.pr:st: cd packages/shared && npx prisma studio && cd ../..
scripts.au:d: cd apps/auth && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.au:b: cd apps/auth && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.au:s: cd apps/auth && npm run start && cd ../..
scripts.la:d: cd apps/landing && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.la:b: cd apps/landing && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.la:s: cd apps/landing && npm run start && cd ../..
scripts.api:d: cd apps/backend && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.api:b: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.api:s: cd apps/backend && npm run start && cd ../..
scripts.app:d: pnpm au:d && pnpm la:d && pnpm api:d
scripts.app:b: pnpm au:b && pnpm la:b && pnpm api:b
scripts.app:s: pnpm au:s && pnpm la:s && pnpm api:s
